scripts.version:major: npm run-script build && npm version major && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.version:minor: npm run-script build && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.version:patch: npm run-script build && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.build: uglifyjs src/fataly.js -o dist/fataly.min.js -c -m && uglifyjs src/fataly.js -o dist/fataly.js -b && npm run-script commit
